author: IzaakWN
body:
#### PR description:

This new `SiPixelVCal DB` object is used for pixel gain calibration. The object saves a map between `DetID`s (i.e. pixel modules) and `VCal` structs. The `VCal` struct only saves two floats: slope and offset to convert VCal to #electrons.
```
#electrons = slope * VCal + offset
```
Documentation is found in these slides:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/914013/#10-gain-calibration-for-run3-p

#### PR validation:

This code does not affect anything else inside CMSSW. It is only used for the pixel gain calibration in the independent [DPGAnalysis-SiPixelTools](https://github.com/cms-analysis/DPGAnalysis-SiPixelTools/blob/23469ffbad894b8f5154fcd7f3ac8bc7538bccca/GainCalibration/plugins/SiPixelOfflineCalibAnalysisBase.cc#L104-L112) repository.

The code compiles and works as expected, for example to create and read a `.db` file (see the above slides).
title: Add SiPixelVCal DB object for pixel gain calibration
